trans-unit.source: Contains instance information about a single instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref>.
<xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> is a single run-time instance of a PriorityBindingExpression.

Therefore, it describes a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects that are attached to a single binding target property, which receives its value from the first <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object in the collection that returns a value successfully.
For information about binding expressions, see the Binding and BindingExpression section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

The binding engine determines which of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects is the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> based on priority.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>.
Gets the active <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object.
The binding engine determines which of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects is the ActiveBindingExpression based on priority.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>.

The active <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if no <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object is active.

Although the return type is <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref>, the returned object is only a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object because the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref> class currently supports only <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> objects.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> objects inside this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression"></xref>.
A read-only collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> objects.

Although the return type is a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> objects, the returned collection only contains <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> objects because the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref> class currently supports only <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> objects.
Gets a value that indicates whether the parent binding has a failed validation rule.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parent binding has a failed validation rule; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref> object from which this <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression"></xref> is created.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref> object from which this <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression"></xref> is created.
Updates the source on the active binding.
This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> property.
Updates the target on the active binding.
This method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateTarget%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBindingExpression.ActiveBindingExpression%2A> property.
